purpose.summary: CICS online program that presents a screen for entering or pre-filling account ID and card number to retrieve and display specific credit card details from the CARDDAT VSAM file. Validates user inputs for numeric format and length, handles PF keys for exit or re-display, and returns control via XCTL or CICS RETURN with updated COMMAREA. Supports invocation from menu or card list screen with pre-validated criteria.
purpose.business_context: Credit card inquiry subsystem allowing lookup of individual card details by account/card combination or account.

inputs.name: CCRDSLAI
inputs.description: Screen input fields for account ID (ACCTSIDI) and card number (CARDSIDI) from user or prior COMMAREA

inputs.name: DFHCOMMAREA
inputs.description: Passed from calling program containing context like FROM-PROGRAM, FROM-TRANID, ACCT-ID, CARD-NUM

inputs.name: CARDDAT
inputs.description: VSAM file containing CARD-RECORD details accessed by card number (primary) or account ID (alternate index CARDAIX)

inputs.name: EIBAID
inputs.description: CICS attention key from DFHAID copybook used to determine user action like ENTER or PF3

outputs.name: CCRDSLAO
outputs.description: Screen output fields populated with titles, dates, input echoes, card details (name, expiry, status), error/info messages

outputs.name: WS-COMMAREA
outputs.description: Updated COMMAREA with context (TO-PROGRAM, TO-TRANID), validated ACCT-ID, CARD-NUM, LAST-MAPSET/MAP returned to transaction

called_programs.purpose: Transfer control to calling program (e.g., menu COMEN01C or list COCRDLIC) on PF3 exit, passing updated COMMAREA

business_rules.description: Account ID must be exactly 11 numeric digits and non-zero if provided
business_rules.logic_summary: Check IS NUMERIC, length implicit via PIC 9(11), ZEROS check; set error flags and message if invalid
conditions: CC-ACCT-ID EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES OR ZEROS

business_rules.description: Card number must be exactly 16 numeric digits if provided
business_rules.logic_summary: Check IS NUMERIC on CC-CARD-NUM-N PIC 9(16); set error flags and message if invalid or blank
conditions: CC-CARD-NUM EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES OR ZEROS

business_rules.description: No search criteria (both account and card blank) triggers 'No input received' error
Read CARDDAT by primary key (card number) succeeds only if exact account+card match found; display details or error
business_rules.logic_summary: CICS READ with RIDFLD cardnum on CARDDAT; NORMAL sets FOUND-CARDS-FOR-ACCOUNT

business_rules.description: Alternate index read by account ID on CARDAIX for cases where only account provided (prepared logic)
business_rules.logic_summary: CICS READ with RIDFLD acct-id on CARDAIX file path; NORMAL sets FOUND-CARDS-FOR-ACCOUNT, NOTFND sets account not found error
